title: Looking to complete Magee Portrait Back Run
author: iwantitiwinit

posts.post_title: Looking to complete Magee Portrait Back Run
posts.post_content: I'm looking to complete a Magee/Magie Portrait back run just two more to go.  I still need Sov 350 and EDPG backs.  I'm interested in both PSA and SGC in any condition.  Please let me know if you have anything available.  Thanks Bob.
